title: Suite Française cover: skinny WPA-ish lettering (like a dieting Futura Display)
author: roquestrew

comments.content:
It looks like a lighter version of Futura Display Compressed. Steile Futura/Tasse is also close, but doesn't have that 'A'.

- Lex

Gracias Mike.  
And "a novel" looks from here [Venus Envy Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106081104/http:/www.typeart.com/family.asp?FID=103&SID=36&CID=1), by Typeart too.
